name: 白敦文
objective: This course explores the rapidly developing fields of big data for decision-making supports in various fields. The topics are about basic concepts of data manipulations, analytic, and communications which include: introduction to big data; basic knowledge of data mining; special topics of big data in business analytics, and data analytic project. The course will help students careful consideration of what is desired from big data, how big data analytic is used to add value to a business, etc. Students can gain a strong data science knowledge set and techniques via in-depth case studies, most current readings and experiences, and most current and future technology exploration.
schedule:
1. Business Intelligence
2. Statistics Bckground
3. Data mining
4. Decision Tree
5. Regression
6.Artificial Neural Network
7. Clustering analytics
8. Association rules
9. Naive Bayes Analytics
10. Support Vector Machine

name: 邱弘緯
objective:
本課程在於培育從事資料科學或機器學習的人員來發展相關知識和技能。課程內容以線性代數、機率、統計學等工程數學為理論學習基礎，操作 Python 作為資料科學的實作工具，包括其相關 Python 基礎語法、各種資料型態、數據 可視化、開源工具等。接著學習利用 Python 取得數據資料，進而操作各種迴歸 分析來手動分析數據資料，並實作梯度遞減，決策樹等最佳化演算方法。最後則是介紹機器學習、深度學習等最新的 AI 演算方法來分析大數據並輔助決策。

This course is designed to develop people engaged in data science or machine learning to develop relevant knowledge and skills. You will understand how data science works based on mathematics, such as linear algebra, probability and statistics. Python is the best tool to learn how to conduct data science analyze data. Learn the basic language skills, common data types, visualization tools and extended modules for data grabbing and regression analysis. Gradient decent and decision tree for optimization will be covered. Finally, AI algorithm, machine learning, and deep learning, are introduced how data help in decision making.
